word:
Those who have followed such a course might better remain at home, pray, and surrender the will to God. They would better fall on the Rock and 


                                 -81- 

be broken, and then they will die to self, and Jesus can make them vessels unto honor. Then they will have fervent and noble affection, which will give fragrance to the character. Christ said, "Be ye holy, for I am holy" [Leviticus 11:44]. [1 Peter 1:13-16, quoted.]
